purpose: Configures a second Raspberry Pi display machine with i3wm and RTL-SDR.
notes: Similar to display-1 but with RTL-SDR added and slight differences in imports (no zram, libinput enabled). Configures Raspberry Pi 4 for display purposes with VPN, audio via PipeWire, and software-defined radio capabilities. Reasoning: Provides a variant display configuration with additional SDR functionality, maintaining the kiosk-style setup.
